member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#EServices#Http Client Nemhandel Status.SendGetRequest(Text,HttpRequestMessage@,Interface::Microsoft#EServices#Http Response Msg Nemhandel@):Boolean
member.summary: Sends a GET request to the Nemhandelregisteret service to check if a company is registered in the service.
member.param: The URI to send the request to.
The response message wrapped in the interface.
member.returns: True if the request was successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#EServices#Http Client Nemhandel Status.GetRequestURI(Text):Text
member.summary: Returns the URI from the Nemhandelregisteret API which is used to check if a company is registered in the service.
member.param: The CVR number of a company.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#EServices#Http Response Msg Nemhandel.IsBlockedByEnvironment:Boolean
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates if the HTTP response is the result of the environment blocking an outgoing HTTP request.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#EServices#Http Response Msg Nemhandel.IsSuccessStatusCode:Boolean
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates if the HTTP response was successful.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#EServices#Http Response Msg Nemhandel.HttpStatusCode:Integer
member.summary: Returns the status code of the HTTP response.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#EServices#Http Response Msg Nemhandel.ReasonPhrase:Text
member.summary: Returns the reason phrase which typically is sent by servers together with the status code.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#EServices#Http Response Msg Nemhandel.GetResponseBody:JsonObject
member.summary: Returns the contents of the HTTP response as a Json object.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#EServices#Http Response Msg Nemhandel.GetResponseBodyAsText:Text
